scripts.deploy:qa: npm run build:schema:qa || true && sam build && sam deploy --template-file template.yaml --stack-name ${npm_package_config_stack_name}-qa --parameter-overrides Environment=qa SchemaS3Key="schemas/schema_${npm_package_config_qa_schema}.graphql"
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build:schema:prod || true && sam build && sam deploy --template-file template.yaml --stack-name ${npm_package_config_stack_name} --parameter-overrides Environment=prod SchemaS3Key="schemas/schema_${npm_package_config_prod_schema}.graphql"
